login.wrongPassword: Your phone number or password is incorrect

register.brandingSlogan: Connect with your close friends and those close to heart.
register.passwordHint: Your password needs to contain at least 8 characters and a number.
register.passwordNotSufficient: Your password needs to contain at least 8 characters with a number.
register.whyPhoneNumber: We will use your phone number to recover your account in the event you forget your password.
register.phoneInvalid: The phone number you provided is not valid.
register.phoneAlreadyInUse: This phone number is already linked to an account. Login instead?
register.phoneVerifyHint: We will verify the number via SMS in the next step.

verify.checkPhone: Please check messages on your phone.
verify.sentCode: We have sent a 6 digit code to
verify.otpInvalid: This OTP has either expired or is invalid. Please request for a new one.

recover.subtitle: Reset your password using your linked phone number.
recover.setNewPasswordSubtitle: Set a new password for your account.
recover.phoneNumberNoExist: This phone number doesn't match any existing account.
recover.otpInvalid: This recovery code has either expired or is invalid. Please request for a new one.

community.communityNoPost: This community does not have any posts

empty.title: This isn't a void deck, it's just a void.
empty.subtitle: This community does not exist. Please ensure that you did not type the name of the community wrongly.

create.title: Create a new community
create.subtitle: Start a space where people of similar interests can enjoy

alreadyExist.title: No new communities can be created
alreadyExist.subtitle: This account already owns a community.

create.alreadyExistSameName: There is already a community with the same or similar name.
create.chooseCarefully: Choose carefully! This cannot be changed after creation.
create.beDescriptive: Be descriptive as possible so that more people can find your community.

takeNote.a: Your community and it's contents cannot contain anything inappropriate
takeNote.b: Don't do anything illegal on KampongTalk
takeNote.c: You are responsible for the posts on your community
takeNote.d: You cannot delete your community after it has been created
takeNote.e: Your account cannot create any new communities in the future

privateAcc.title: This is a private account
privateAcc.subtitle: You need to be {ViewingUser.Name}'s friend to see their post.

empty.title: Hmm, there's nothing here
empty.subtitle: This user has not created any posts

edit.name: Name
edit.kampongIdHint: For security reasons, please visit account settings to change your KampongID.

notExist.title: We searched high and low, but we weren't able to find this account.
notExist.subtitle:
The user may have changed their user tag, deleted their account, or the user simply didn't exist to begin with.
Please ensure that you did not make any typing mistakes.

privateAccountFriendsList.title: This user's profile is not public
privateAccountFriendsList.subtitle: To see this user's friend list, you need to be their friend.

friendListEmpty.title: This user's friend list is empty
friendListEmpty.subtitle: Try sending a friend request!

users.hint: If you have the KampongID of the user you are looking for, type @ followed by the KampongID in the search, to go directly to the user's profile.

kampongId.title: Your KampongID
kampongId.subtitle: Help friends and family easily find you using your KampongID.
kampongId.hint: You can share your KampongID with your friends and family for them to easily locate your profile page just by typing it into the search bar.

accountPrivacySecurity.title: Account Privacy & Security
accountPrivacySecurity.subtitle: Keep your account secured and control it's visibility.
accountPrivacySecurity.passwordDesc: Change your password often to keep your account secure.

profilePrivacy.privateDesc: Your profile page can only be viewed by your friends.
profilePrivacy.publicDesc: Your profile page can be viewed by anyone.

accessibilityLanguage.title: Accessibility & Language
accessibilityLanguage.subtitle: Change the way KampongTalk looks for your comfort.

changeId.afterChange1: Users can only use your new KampongID to find you.
changeId.afterChange2: The web address to your profile page will be changed.
changeId.afterChange3: Your old KampongID will be available for other users to change to.
changeId.friendsFam: Make sure you give your friends & family a heads up so that they can find you using your new KampongID.
changeId.idUsed: This KampongID is currently being used by another user.
changeId.idBelongs: This KampongID already belongs to you. No changes required.
changeId.change1: As you are performing a major change to your account, we will need your password to continue.

changePassword.newPwMsg: Your new password needs to contain at least 8 characters and a number

changePrivacy.title: Profile privacy
changePrivacy.whenYouSet: When you set your profile to private,

noticeList.a: Only your friends can see your profile page and posts published on your profile.
noticeList.b: Posts to communities will still remain public.
noticeList.c: Your friend list will only be viewable by you and your friends.
noticeList.d: You will need to add users as friends to give them access to your profile page.

smsMessages.verifyPhone:
Hello {selectedUser.Name}. You are almost done creating your KampongTalk account.

We need you to verify this phone number in order to complete the creation of your account.

Please enter the code below into KampongTalk:
{otpRecord.Metadata} (Valid for 10mins)
smsMessages.recoverAccount:
Hello {selectedUser.Name} (@{selectedUser.Uid2}). A password reset was requested for your KampongTalk account.

If this action is done by you, please enter the following into KampongTalk:
{otpRecord.Metadata} (Valid for 10mins)

If you did not request for this, ignore and delete this message. DO NOT GIVE this code to anyone, including KampongTalk staff.

preferences.audioCuesDesc: Sounds effects will be used when interacting with KampongTalk.

doneStep.accountSetup: Your Account is all set up!
doneStep.guidedTourQn: Do you wish to take a guided tour around KampongTalk?
doneStep.takeToKTDirectly: Take me to the Kampong directly

empty.suggestion: We suggest finding some friends at the Void Deck
empty.takeMeToVD: Take me to the Void Deck
empty.bringKtToLife: Write a new post to bring the Kampong to life.
empty.noComms: There are no communities to display.
empty.noEvents: There are no events to display.
empty.scrollToEnd: Wow, it looks like you've scrolled to the bottom of the KampongBoard!

createPost.noSearchComms: We couldn't find any communities with that name.
createPost.noSuggComms: There are no communities to display.

detail.noComms: No comments have been left on this post.

digimap.name: Digital Void deck
digimap.chatsuccess: You have successfully entered the chat!

support.subject: Subject
support.successmessage: You have successfully submitted your enquiry!

guides.tip: Tip: If you're stuck on a page, help is just a click away
guides.boardDesc: Share about yourself. Engage with others.
guides.commsDesc: Find posts by topics and interests.
guides.voidDeckDesc: Meet new people in your neighbourhood.
guides.eventsDesc: Participate in and create fun events.
guides.settingsDesc: Customise the app to fit your needs.

guides.intro1: Click on any of these boxes to get a tour of that feature.

map.intro1: This is where you can access all the features of KampongTalk.
map.intro2: Here, you can access your private messages.
map.intro3: Have a specific interest or hobby? Find posts grouped by topics here.
map.intro4: At the Void Deck, you can find and meet new people in the neighbourhood.
map.intro5: Here, you can view and create posts. Share about your day, or catch up with friends.
map.intro7: Looking for a way to pass the time? Browse and create engaging events here.
map.intro8: Click here to close the map and return to your previous page.
map.intro10: View and customise your profile here.
map.intro12: Click this button to exit Kampong Talk.

board.intro1: Here, you can share about your day, or catch up with friends.
board.intro2: Select which type of posts you would like to see - All of them, or just those from friends.
board.intro3: View the posts here. Click 'Like' if you enjoy the content, and 'Reply' to view replies or leave your own.
board.intro4: Here are the most popular communities currently.
board.intro5: Here are the most popular upcoming events.
board.intro6: Click here to write a post.

communities.intro1: Find posts grouped by topics here.
communities.intro2: If your ideal community does not exist yet, you could start your own.
communities.intro4: Browse the most popular communities on KampongTalk.

voidDeck.intro1: Here, you can find and meet new people in the neighbourhood.
voidDeck.intro2: Each chatroom represents a different neighbourhood. Enter one and chat with those inside.

events.intro1: Looking for a way to pass the time? Browse and create engaging events here.
events.intro2: Explore all the fun events KampongTalk has to offer.
events.intro3: Here you can create and host your own events.
events.intro4: Here you can view the events you signed up for, past events, and the events you created.

chats.intro1: Here, you can access your private messages. Click on a row to open that chat.
chats.title2: To start a chat with a user,
chats.intro2: Message them from their profile or one of their posts. Happy messaging! 💬

support.intro1: Here, you can connect with KampongTalk staff. Submit a question, report a user or suggest a feature. 🙂
support.intro2: Here are other ways you can contact us.

profile.intro1: Here users can show off their personality.
profile.intro2: Posts are given colours based on this banner.
profile.intro3: Here you can view basic user information.
profile.intro4: This is the KampongID, which is unique to every user. You can use this to search for a specific user.
profile.intro5: Click here to view the Friends list.
profile.intro6: Click here to customise your profile.
profile.intro7: Click here to message this user.
profile.intro8: Click here to send a friend request to this user.
profile.intro9: These are the most recent posts.

settings.intro1: Here you can customise KampongTalk to fit your needs.
settings.intro2: You can change your unique KampongID so that family and friends may find you easily.
settings.title3: Manage your Account Privacy and Security
settings.intro3: Change your password or Control the visibility of your account.
settings.intro4: Customise the app just the way you want it. Change your language, text size, and more.
